name: Jezza
description:
JEZZA is a unique vehicle physics game that will test your handling skills. Designed to deliver immediate fun, speed, tension, beauty, frustration and satisfaction!

Race around swarms of road users and bump their caravans off the streets! Speed across the busy motorway and feel the down force of Harrier Jump Jets on the runway. Face your fears in the bridges area, burn through your tyres in the car park, make your way over the rough terrain and screech through the big city blocks. Progress through unlimited stages by timing your way between floating, rotating and oscillating cones. Do all this while avoiding the police and keeping the school buses safe. Jezza is a new driving experience. Think you can handle it?

Main Features:
- 7 abstract driving areas and 11 varied drivable vehicles to unlock.
- Realistic vehicle physics, rewarding sound and gorgeous isometric visuals.
- Simply touch to direct your vehicle with single handbrake and reverse button.
- Control speed by varying the distance between vehicle and where you touch.
- Unlimited progressively challenging stages that will really test a multitude of skills.
- Clean and immediate menu. Choose vehicle, touch area and GO!
- Game Center optional. No ads. No in-app purchases.
- Minimum required: iPad 2 and iOS6.
